About

Come join TUDev at Locowl Hack Day, our first hackathon! As a part of MLH's Local Hack Day, we want to gather all of the best collegiate minds together for a day full of building and innovation! Hosted at Impact Hub in Philadelphia, we are expecting a real hoot of a time!
